instruction: [INST] Analyze this file to learn MacBook motherboard repair. The 'definitions' section explains key technical terms. The 'threads' section contains real-world repair discussions. Use both sections to understand and learn how to troubleshoot MacBook issues. Posts from username 'larossmann' , 'dukefawks' , and '2informaticos' are posts from trusted experts.[/INST]

threads.title: 820-3023-A Need bios to test
threads.message:
Hello there,

820-3023-A, fan spins, no chime, directly white screen but no image, red light on mouse and cpu gets warm.
No liquid at all, no reaction to PRAM with internal keyboard and external usb keyboard (with the internel disconnected).

Unfortunately i don't have an identical donnour board to try another Bios even thought I would have to clean ME later. Other than that I have no clue because no apparent damage even near bios area...

This post is similar to [USER="1524"]Paul Daniels[/USER] 's one : [URL="https://www.rossmanngroup.com/boards/forum/board-repair-troubleshooting/37572-solved-820-3023-a-bios-required"][COLOR=#0000ff]https://www.rossmanngroup.com/boards/forum/board-repair-troubleshooting/37572-solved-820-3023-a-bios-required[/COLOR][/URL] at the exception that I have white screen.

I can't access  [USER="36"]aprendiz[/USER] link, can you please upload the link or grant me access?
Thanks

threads.title: 820-3023-A Need bios to test
threads.message:
I don't remember where I got them from; just for try...
[url]https://drive.google.com/open?id=1FFQRd-M9UeI66-PpzitF9Balnp3uVA_f[/url]

threads.title: 820-3023-A Need bios to test
threads.message: Ok thanks I will report back!

threads.title: 820-3023-A Need bios to test
threads.message:
Waw, fantastic! it works, boards chimes and boots.
I will try to copy my original ME over this working test bios.

threads.title: 820-3023-A Need bios to test
threads.message:
Don't forget about serial number.
Copy entire Fsys block from your backup...

threads.title: 820-3023-A Need bios to test
threads.message:
I changed the serial + MLB numbers.
And copied the original 17D000 length block over the working bios. Is that what you refer to entirr Fsys block?
Thanks!

threads.title: 820-3023-A Need bios to test
threads.message:
Search the dump for Fsys string.
Copy it until $SVS string...

threads.title: 820-3023-A Need bios to test
threads.message:
Thanks! Awsome, it works great and ASD EFI passed. Before it did'nt found the override file because only system and mlb serials were changed...
Now all is good. This post can be marked solved!
